body:
From what I see, [numpy doesn't have an `axis` argument for `put`](https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.put.html), and [`take` behavior can be simulated with advanced indexing](https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.take.html).
@Alok if I understand correctly, what you are looking for can be achieved with [`tensor.index_select`](http://pytorch.org/docs/0.3.1/torch.html?highlight=index_select#torch.index_select)
